name: Titanium.UI.iPad.SplitWindow
summary: A SplitWindow is a window that manages the presentation of two side-by-side view controllers.

properties.name: button
properties.summary: For detail view type, the button that is automatically wired to control the master view popover.

properties.name: popover
properties.summary: For either popover or detail view types, the popover instance.

properties.name: view
properties.summary: Type of view becoming visible. Either master, popover or detail.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: detailView
properties.summary: View for the detail view section of the SplitWindow.

properties.name: masterView
properties.summary: View for the master view section of the SplitWindow.

properties.name: showMasterInPortrait
properties.summary: Determines whether to show the master view in portrait orientation.
